descriptionHtml:
Faeye is a Slayer(custom class) with custom outfit which is available from this site.  She also carry a set of specially enchanted gears be fit as a Slayer.  She will change her outfit when she entered player house and at sleep;for now, she wears the same outfit.

Features:
- Can be married
- Overpower follower; weak version also available.
- Faeye will eventually master the following:One-Hand, Two-Hand, Block, Marksman, Light Armor, Illusion and Sneak.
- Spells included are: Candlelight, FastHealing, Healing, HealingHands and Invisibility.
- Fully Perks included: All the category which she can master.

Equips Enchantment:
All her initial weapons are specially enchanted with damage and visual effects, and they\'re tempered-able.  You can disenchant to learn and put that enchantment on any other weapon as you wish.
If you chose to use the enchantment on other weapon, I suggest you don\'t mix it, otherwise you will loose visual effects.  During enchanting process, drag the slider bar from initial location(most right) to slightly left then back to max right.  This will make the 000 shown as some other number as number of charges.  If you leave at 000, the game may crash at later time.

Her amulet is already Enchanted with Godly stats.  If you don\'t like Godly stats, use the Alternative version.

Location:
Faeye is right inside Whiterun - Dragonreach.

Required Mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]
Evening Star by FavoredSoul
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5727]Isilmeriel LOTR Weapons Collection[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9752]Masters of Death - Rise of the Brotherhood[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7736]Layer Bikini[/url]

Beautified Mods Used:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]UNP[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899]UNPB[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7897]envision Face - Large Lips[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7127]RANs HeadMesh - Type D[/url]

Installation:
Extract everything into your ~skyrim/data/ folder.  Activate Faeye.esp.
If you use mods such as Ultimate Follower Overhaul, please load Faeye.esp before these.

Debug:
- Purple hands and feets - Should be fixed with version 1.3
- Only seeing Faeye head.  This is most likely due to you don\'t have the correct Armor Mods with correct body type installed.  Try re-install the required mods.

Optional:
I have included the Player Custom.esp and Combat Music Fix.esp

In the Player Custom.esp, there are 4 items which may interest you.
[list]
- Amulet of Light - Auto cast Candlelight when in Interior or during combat. Auto cast Cure Diseases during combat.

- Dread Knight Slayer Bow and Dread Knight Slayer Sword - These have the same enchantment as Faeye\'s initial weapon.  You will need [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15494]Dread Knight Weapon Set[/url] if you decide to use these.

- Unwavering Promise - This basically has Godly enchantment same as Faeye\'s Mother\'s Gift.  Additionally, it will reduce all Shout recast to 0 and your walk, run is increased by 50 percent.
[/list]

Combat Music Fix.esp: you only need this if you want to hear combat music while wearing Unwavering Promise.

Update:
1.3
- Updated FaceGenTint(possible fix for purple hands feets).
- Switch to Layer Bikini as SleepOutfit due to body mods compatibility.
- Added Shock version of weapon enchantment.
- Included textures and meshes for Evening Star by FavoredSoul due to mod is no longer available for download.  I might have to change this to something else.  I hope not.
       
1.2 
- Fixed Vanilla Player House location.
- Fixed possible game crash due to infinite stacks of [i]speedmult[/i].
- Removed enchantment from Bikini.
- Added alternative version - no Godly enchant on Mother\'s Gift.

1.1
- I uploaded wrong file.  Updated with file without Trainer Option.  I have not create quest script for these yet.

Note:
Thanks to the people whom I posted in the Required Mods and in addition:

AmethystDeceiver - Black Tower and Black Sacrament Armor pack
Herko ter Horst - SHARPE - Housecarls
They gave me the idea on how to make the Outfit switching script.
and
Malise - A Companion By Joseph Anthony
author: SamayouSamurai
